casebody.data:
LORILLARD TOBACCO COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Michelle MROZEK, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Jacqueline Swann Miller. No. 13-1185. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014.

Case below, 106 So.3d 479.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District, denied.
